h3.a: Fill out your Census Information Here

div.p: Census data helps secure funding for school lunch programs and title programs.Help shape our school's future. Please visit 2020census.gov to respond online.

People with no symptoms have the potential to unknowingly spread COVID-19! That’s why it’s best for everyone in your family to stay at home and away from others as much as possible until instructed...

Reminder to 2020 Seniors: Today, Tuesday, April the 14th, Blafour will be at the school to deliver your caps and gowns. Look for an email from Balfour to explain the payment options and confirm your order. They will be set up on the front steps and they will deliver to your car so that there will be limited interaction. Here is the schedule for today based on your last name. A-F 9:30-10 G-L 10-10:30 M-P 10:30-11 R-Z 11- 11:30 Please enter the front parking lot and stay in your car in a line (don't pull into a space). Tell us the last name and we will bring your order to your car. If you have any questions about your order, call Balfour at 1-800-766-0148. If you have questions about the process, please call the school or email me at abramlett@eastland.esc14.net. If you have paid and you can not be here today, I will have the caps and gowns at the school and you can set up a time at a later date to pick them up.
Adam Bramlett
Updated Meal Schedule Starting 4/14/20

***Urgent Please Read and Pass Along***
Please note the updated schedule for meal pick-up starting Tuesday April 14, 2020.
There is no change to the meal pick-up at Siebert Elementary:
11:00 – 12:30 East side of Siebert Elementary

However, we are adjusting the off campus sites to the following schedule:
11:00 – 11:20 Sadosa Ridge Apartments (600 W Sadosa St)
Morton Valley (Intersection of 112 and 101)
11:30 – 11:50 First Baptist Church (405 S Seaman St)
Friendship Park (North Lamar and Seaman St)
12:00 – 12:20 Olden Fire Department (225 Co Rd 448, Olden)
12:20 - 12:45 Carbon Ag and Outdoors (401 Main St, Carbon)
12:30 – 1:00 Lake Leon Baptist Church (2601 FM2214)
The teams will try to stay on this time schedule as close as possible. We will still be giving out lunch for that day and breakfast for the next day.
Thank you,
Jeremy Williams - Assistant Superintendent EISD

Eastland County Today
Dear Seniors of 2020 we are preparing for Graduations as usual and will run the Senior Profiles. Please fill out the form and email to ecnads@yahoo.com or come by office at 215 S. Seaman in Eastland and drop them off, or mail to P.O. Box 29 Eastland Texas 76448. The deadline will be May 23rd. There is NO charge for this so please turn yours in. It will be for all of Eastland County schools. Cisco, Eastland, Gorman, Ranger and Rising Star.

Attention 2020 Seniors:
Next Tuesday, April the 14th, Blafour will be at the school to deliver your caps and gowns. Look for an email from Balfour to explain the payment options and confirm your order. I am having them set up on the front steps and they will deliver to your car so that there will be limited interaction. I have set up the following schedule for pick up based on your last name.
A-F 9:30-10
G-L 10-10:30
M-P 10:30-11
R-Z 11- 11:30
Please enter the front parking lot and stay in your car in a line (don't pull into a space). Tell us the last name and we will bring your order to your car. If you have any questions about your order, call Balfour at 1-800-766-0148. If you have questions about the process, please call the school or email me at abramlett@eastland.esc14.net.

You are missed,
Adam Bramlett
